title: Graph of deriv.: 4 segments part - c

content.description: Let g be a continuous function with g(2) = 5. The graph of the piecewise-linear function g', the derivative of g, is shown above for −3 ≤ x ≤ 7.
content.question: Find the average rate of change of g(x) on the interval −3 ≤ x ≤ 7.

frqParts.text: Find the average rate of change of g(x) on the interval −3 ≤ x ≤ 7.

topic.text: 2.1: Defining Average and Instantaneous Rates of Change at a Point

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Confirm whether hypotheses or conditions of a selected definition, theorem, or test have been satisfied.
